0.Description: When set to true only admins can edit the configuration
When set to true, a message is sent if an error happens during command execution
When set to true, a message is sent if a new member joins or a member leaves the server
The channel in which welcome messages are sent. If null, this defaults to the general channel of the server (if any)
The rule channel of the server. If not null, it is displayed in the welcome message

1.Description: The moeration role of the server
The role assigned when a member is muted
The number of rules in the server
The number of custom commands in the server

2.Description: When set to true, members require the DJ role to run certain music commands
The role used for DJ Enforcement

4.Description: When set to true, the bot can post NSFW posts from NSFW subreddits
When set to true, members can run the `fun spam` command
When set to true, members can run the `fun ghost` command

6.Description: The channel in which Connect4 matches are hosted
The channel in which TicTacToe matches are hosted

8.Description: Weather or not AI Chatting is enabled in the server
The channel in which AI chats are conducted
